EMAIL_ALL_LAZY_GROUP_MEMBERS_MESSAGE:
Hi,

 you are a member of a group in {0}. You were not active for {1} in your group.
 Let"s have a look at your common document, probably someone added something new.
EMAIL_ALL_ACTIVE_GROUP_MEMBERS_FIRST_MES:
Hi,

 You are a member of a group in {0}. The topic will enter consensus stage in {1}.
 We suggest to read your collaborative document once again at that time, to eliminate last mistakes in your common text.
EMAIL_ALL_ACTIVE_GROUP_MEMBERS_SECOND_ME:
Hi,

 You are a member of a group in {0}. The current level will end in {1}.
 We highly suggest to check your collaborative document for final corrections.
EMAIL_RATING_REMINDER_GROUP_MEMBERS_MESS:
Hi,

 You are a member of a group in {0}. Currently no one has given any rating in your current group.
 Please rate the other members to increase the chance that qualified people will represent your group.
EMAIL_REMINDER_PROPOSAL_FIRST_MESSAGE:
Hi,

 you are a participant of topic {0}. The topic will enter consensus stage in {1}.
 We highly suggest to check your proposal for final corrections.
EMAIL_REMINDER_PROPOSAL_SECOND_MESSAGE:
Hi,

 you are a participant of topic {0}. The topic will enter consensus stage in {1}.
 We suggest to read your proposal once again at that time, to eliminate last mistakes in your text.
EMAIL_CONSENSUS_START_MESSAGE:
Hi,

 the consensus stage of the topic {0} has just started and you are part of it.  You have been assigned to the group #{1}. You and four other team members will be working on a joint proposal.

 You can find the group"s link here:
 http://mind-about-sagacitysite.c9.io/group/{1}

 Thank you for your engagement!
EMAIL_TOPIC_PASSED_MESSAGE:
Hi,

 The topic {0} you were participating has finished right now.
 Have a look at the final result:
 http://mind-about-sagacitysite.c9.io/file/topic/final/{1}

 Thank you for your engagement!
EMAIL_LEVEL_CHANGE_MESSAGE:
Hi,

 The consensus stage of the topic {0} has reached a new level and so have you.
 You have been assigned to the group #{1}.  You and four other new team members will be working on a joint proposal again.

 You can find the group"s link here:
 http://mind-about-sagacitysite.c9.io/group/{1}

 Thank you for your engagement!
EMAIL_REGISTRATION_MESSAGE:
Welcome {0} at Evocracy,

 You just created an account at {1}. Please verify your email by visiting:

 {1}/json/auth/verifyEmail/{0}

 If you did not register, just ignore this message.
EMAIL_PASSWORD_RESET_MESSAGE:
Hi,

 You ordered a password reset for evocracy. Your temporary password is:

{0}

 We highly suggest to change the password directly after your next login to a password of your choice.
REJECTED_NOT_ENOUGH_VOTES: Not enough participants in selection stage
REJECTED_NOT_ENOUGH_VALID_USER_PROPOSALS: Not enough valid proposals in proposal stage
PROPOSAL_QUERIED_NOT_IN_PROPOSAL_STAGE: The related topic is not in proposal stage any more.
GROUP_QUERIED_NOT_ACTIVE: The group is not active any more.
DEFAULT_TOPIC_TEXT: Our suggestion: Write a short summary on top of your topic description, such that other readers can get a quick overview.
DEFAULT_PROPOSAL_TEXT: Our suggestion: Write a short summary on top of your proposal, such that other readers can get a quick overview.
DEFAULT_GROUP_TEXT: Our suggestion: Write a short summary on top of your document, such that other readers can get a quick overview. Also add a section in the end where you collect all aspects where no consensus was achieved, such that further groups can consider those aspects easier.
USER_PASSWORT_NOT_CORRECT: Password is not correct. Did you forget your password?
USER_FORM_EMAIL_MISSING: You did not enter an email address.
USER_FORM_VALIDATION_ERROR: There was something wrong with the entered data. Please check your input again.
USER_FORM_VALIDATION_ERROR_EMAIL: The entered email address does not meet the necessary form, please check it.
USER_FORM_VALIDATION_ERROR_PASSWORD:
The entered password does not meet the necessary form, please check it.
Hint: whitespace is not allowed.
USER_ACCOUNT_EMAIL_NOT_EXIST: The entered email address »{0}« is not connected to an user account. Do you have a typo?
USER_ACCOUNT_NOT_VERIFIED: You have not verified your email-address. Click here to send verification email again.
USER_ACCOUNT_ALREADY_EXISTS: Account already exists. Please just log in.
USER_ACCOUNT_VERIFICATION_LINK_SENT: To verify your email address, we"ve sent an email to you. Please check your inbox and click the containing link.
USER_ACCOUNT_EMAIL_UPDATED: The entered email-address was updated sucessfully.
USER_ACCOUNT_PASSWORD_UPDATED: The entered password was updated sucessfully.
USER_ACCOUNT_PASSWORD_RESET: A new password was sent to »{0}«. After logging in, you should immediately change your password.
TOPIC_NOT_AUTHORISIZED_FOR_UPDATE: Only the author can update the topic.
TOPIC_NOT_AUTHORISIZED_FOR_DELETION: Only the author can delete the topic.
TOPIC_UPDATE_ONLY_IN_SELECTION_STAGE: Topic may only be edited in selection stage.
TOPIC_NAME_EMPTY: Topic name is empty, please name it.
TOPIC_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: A Topic with this name already exists.
TOPIC_REQUIREMENT_PROPOSAL_STAGE: Topic must be at least in proposal stage.
